    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddProduct
    The AddProduct class provides functionality to add a new product to the pharmacy stock.
    Admin
    The Admin class represents an administrator user who can manage other users.
    DeleteProduct
    The DeleteProduct class provides functionality to delete a product from the pharmacy stock.
    Employee
    The Employee class represents an employee user in the system.
    FileHelper
    Utility class for file operations related to Pharmacy data.
    Listable
    Interface representing a listable entity.
    ListProduct
    This class handles listing products available in a pharmacy's inventory.
    LowStockViewer
    The LowStockViewer class is responsible for reading the pharmacy stock data from a JSON file, identifying products with low stock, and displaying them.
    Main
    Main class for the pharmacy management application.
    Pharmacy
    Represents a pharmacy with a name, address, and a list of product categories.
    PharmacyWrapper
    Wrapper class for Pharmacy.
    Product
    Represents a product in the pharmacy.
    ProductCategory
    Represents a category of products, including a main category and a subcategory.
    ReadRequest
    This class is responsible for reading and displaying the pharmacy's order history.
    RequestProduct
    This class handles customer product requests in a pharmacy system.
    SearchProduct
    This class provides functionality to search for products in a pharmacy's stock.
    SearchProduct.PharmacyWrapper
    Wrapper class for Pharmacy object to match the JSON structure.
    Stockable
    Interface representing a stockable item.
    User
    Abstract class representing a user in the system.
    UserManagementMenu
     
    UserManager
    Manages user registration, login, and user-related operations.
    UserRole
    Interface representing a user role in the system.
